oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SEQUEL: A Public-domain Simulation Platform for Electronics and Power Electronics
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, MB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: circuits
performance
circuit simulation
electronics
graphics interface
power electronics
schematic capture
steady-state analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: SEQUEL (a Solver of circuit EQuations with User-defined ELements) is a public-domain simulation package that has been used for a variety of applications. A graphics interface has recently been added to SEQUEL, in order to make it more user-friendly and better suitable for teaching purposes. The package can be downloaded freely. In this paper, some of the features of SEQUEL are described, along with examples.
